sentences.english: Osteoma should be included in the differential diagnosis of calcified masses in cerebellopontine angle.
sentences.chinese: 在小腦橋腦角之鈣化腫塊，骨瘤必須列入鑑別診斷。

sentences.english: Unlike computers, you'll never come across a situation where your brain says the hard drive is full.
sentences.chinese: 人腦燦像電腦，小腦的“硬盤”永遠沒有會步杌用。

sentences.english: After cerebella block operation, what does sequela have?
sentences.chinese: 小腦梗阻手術後，後遺症有哪些？

sentences.english: Functionally, both cerebellum and PAG are related to visceral activities.
sentences.chinese: 小腦和PAG均與許多內臟的功能活動有關。

sentences.english: The gray matter lining the clefts is characterized by polymicrogyria.
sentences.chinese: 灰質內襯的腦裂是多小腦回的特徵性表現。

sentences.english: The posterior group arteries supply the superior cerebellar peduncle.
sentences.chinese: 後羣動脈供應小腦上腳和前髓帆。

sentences.english: I began to think that this small-brained thing might be a very early whale.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想那個小腦動物很可能就是早期鯨。

sentences.english: Conclusions Dysplastic gangliocytoma of the cerebellum is a benign neoplasm, and has a preferable prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論小腦發育不良性節細胞瘤爲良性腫瘤，預後良好。

sentences.english: Objective To provide the anatomical data of cerebellar arteries for neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲神經外科提供小腦動脈的臨牀解剖學資料。

sentences.english: A little extra Vasoactive Peptide in the Cerebellum?
sentences.chinese: 抑或是小腦中的一些額外的血管活性肽作用了？

sentences.english: Objective To report the result of microsurgery treatment for 16 cases of cholesteatoma at the cerebellum-pontine angle.
sentences.chinese: 目的報告16例橋小腦角膽脂瘤的顯微外科治療。

sentences.english: The cerebellar lesion (arrowhead) is of low T1 signal intensity, indicative of a cyst.
sentences.chinese: 小腦病變T1序列顯示爲低信號影，代表囊性病變。

sentences.english: Results The density of retraction ball (RB) in the basal portion of the pons and superior cerebellar peduncle was the highest.
sentences.chinese: 結果軸突回縮球密度在橋腦基底部和小腦上腳最高。

sentences.english: The part of the brain that is associated with tickling is the cerebellum.
sentences.chinese: 腦部與怕癢有關的部位是小腦。

sentences.english: Objective To study safety paracentesis depth in cerebellomedullary cistern and its clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小腦延髓池安全穿刺深度及臨牀意義。

sentences.english: A hyperintense round lesion is also seen in the cerebellum (arrowhead).
sentences.chinese: 小腦同時看到一個高信號的圓形病變。

definition: to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to bare fangs and brandish claws (idiom); to make threatening gestures
young married woman/mistress/(fig.) punching bag/(old) child bride
